MdePkg/Include/Guid/SmBios.h File Reference


Defines

#define SMBIOS_TABLE_GUID

Variables

EFI_GUID gEfiSmbiosTableGuid

Detailed Description

GUIDs used to locate the SMBIOS tables in the UEFI 2.0 system table.

This GUID in the system table is the only legal way to search for and locate the SMBIOS tables. Do not search the 0xF0000 segment to find SMBIOS tables.

Revision Reference:
GUIDs defined in UEFI 2.0 spec.
